meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foreign.
meanings.sent1: The foreignnesses of the new city overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent2: The foreignnesses of the language made it hard to communicate.
meanings.sent3: The foreignnesses of the food led to some interesting culinary adventures.
meanings.sent4: The foreignnesses of the culture enveloped him like a mysterious cloak.
meanings.sent5: The foreignnesses of the landscape left a lasting impression on her mind.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being unfamiliar or strange.
meanings.sent1: The foreignnesses of the old house gave it an eerie vibe.
meanings.sent2: The foreignnesses of the situation made her uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The foreignnesses of the costume party made for some hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The foreignnesses of the music filled the room with an otherworldly atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The foreignnesses of the painting captured everyone's attention immediately.

meanings.definition: The condition of being from another country.
meanings.sent1: The foreignnesses of his accent revealed his origins.
meanings.sent2: The foreignnesses of the traditions brought a sense of diversity to the community.
meanings.sent3: The foreignnesses of the souvenir shop made him feel like a tourist in his own town.
meanings.sent4: The foreignnesses of the flag fluttering in the wind symbolized unity in diversity.
meanings.sent5: The foreignnesses of the spices in the dish transported her to distant lands.
